original_text: This is it that belongeth unto the Levites: from twenty and five years old and upward they shall go in to wait upon the service of the tabernacle of the congregation:
korean_text: 레위인은 이같이 할지니 곧 이십오 세 이상으로는 회막에 들어가서 복무하고 봉사할 것이요

sentences.original_text: This is it that belongeth unto the Levites:
from twenty and five years old and upward
they shall go in to wait upon the service
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 들어가서 섬기는 일을 맡을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: of the tabernacle of the congregation:
